resources.string: My Notes is a simple application where we can Create our Notes as well as Read, Update, Delete and Share those Notes as Well.\nHope this application will help you.
To Read any Notes click on Notes which is created by yourself.
For Deleting Notes just swipe left or right by pressing the Specific Note.
To Create any Notes you just have to click \'+\' button, then write your Notes.
Through clicking the Notes, a interface will be opened where you can Update your Notes.
To Share any Note just click on the specific note and click to the share button.
Just click \'"Delete All Notes"\' option which is in the toolbar, to Delete All Notes at once.
